commit message: Adding patch from #239 with one line removed that seemed to be unnecessary.
delay fix for show dashboard animation.
Get rid of the '?' character beneath images on post upload, check for below zero index in WPHtml
added try/catch around setting the current blog, because user could have come from share action.
set last selected blog from share action.
Fix for media that was shared with file:// instead of a content URI
prevent blog prompt from being cancelable.
start of change to have Read button be a wp-admin loader, fixed up lbs stuff.
start of change to have Read button be a wp-admin loader, fixed up lbs stuff.
Landscape editor has formatting buttons, reset WordPress.currentBlog every time a blog is removed from the app.
Added wp icon for dashboard, and updated version number.
Fixed QuickPress shortcuts, added exception catching for creating a blog, increases stability.
Update blog title in onResume, also added html escaping to blog title.
color text in image alert dialog, this way it shows on kindle fire and white/black variants of the dialog across platforms.
Fix for some of the stats views on > 3.0 devices. Can't perform any networking on main thread.
Should help users that couldn't get to their Dashboard, this doesn't require xmlrpc.php file, instead replaces everything after the last '/'
Noticed that the blog name needed to be escaped in comment notifications.
Potential fix for Xperia device keyboards, received via email.
Tweaks and bug fixes, including fix for #254
Fix for some self-hosted stats users, uses wp.getOptions to grab the blog url.
Four w's are just not right.
set wpcom login fields to be singleLine
protection added around setting post content until we can figure out why some post content causes f/c
Null check in link parser. Android core bug?
Fixed some of the weird behavior that would occur in the rich text editor.

Added support for all types of
tags
Added support for scheduled to appear as a post status.
